description: Delete an addon credits package. Accepts DeleteAddonInput with addonId (required, String). Permanently removes addon package. Returns DeleteAddonResponse with message (String), id (String). Raises NotFoundError (404) if addon not found. Raises ForbiddenError (403) if not SuperAdmin.
graphql_operation: mutation DeleteAddon($input: DeleteAddonInput!) { billing { deleteAddon(input: $input) { message id } } }
